text: José Gea Escolano (14 June 1929 - 6 February 2017) was a Spanish Roman Catholic bishop. He was born in El Real de Gandia, Community of Valencia. Gea Escolano became a priest in 1953. He served as the Bishop of Ibiza from 1976 to 1987. He was later the Bishop of Mondoñedo-Ferrol from 1987 until his retirement in 2005. Gea Escolano died on 6 February 2017 in Valencia, at the age of 87. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2017 deaths Category:People from the Valencian Community Category:Spanish Roman Catholic bishops
title: José Gea Escolano
